scripts.deploy:stage:legacy: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter user-application run stage:deploy
scripts.deploy:stage:foundry: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run stage:deploy
scripts.deploy:stage:backend-legacy: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run stage:deploy
scripts.deploy:stage:backend-foundry: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-engine run deploy:stage
scripts.deploy:production:legacy: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter user-application run production:deploy
scripts.deploy:production:foundry: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run production:deploy
scripts.deploy:production:backend-legacy: pnpm i && pnpm run build-package && pnpm --filter data-service run production:deploy
scripts.deploy:production:backend-foundry: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-engine run deploy:production
scripts.foundry:dev: pnpm run foundry:dev-dashboard & pnpm run foundry:dev-engine
scripts.foundry:deploy-dashboard: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run deploy
scripts.foundry:deploy-engine: pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-engine run deploy
scripts.foundry:deploy: pnpm run foundry:deploy-dashboard && pnpm run foundry:deploy-engine
scripts.foundry:typecheck:build: pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run typecheck:build && pnpm --filter @repo/foundry-core run typecheck
scripts.foundry:deploy:stage: pnpm run predeploy:validate:stage && pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-engine run deploy:stage && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run deploy:stage
scripts.foundry:deploy:production: pnpm run predeploy:validate:production && pnpm i && pnpm --filter foundry-engine run deploy:production && pnpm --filter foundry-dashboard run deploy:production
